card.name: Star Lead, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command Dragon/Revolutionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Double Breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 or less shields, your opponent can only untap one of their creatures at the start of their turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Magic Command/Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water command(When one of your water commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 4 cards. Then, your opponent chooses 2 cards from your hand at random and puts them on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this Card Type is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost) Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, you may show a fire creature to your opponent and destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has that creatures power or less. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, add the revealed card to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
